content.question: Which of the following is equivalent to the expression <math alttext="4 open parentheses cos squared open parentheses fraction numerator 2 pi over denominator 5 end fraction close parentheses minus sin squared open parentheses fraction numerator 2 pi over denominator 5 end fraction close parentheses close parentheses"><mn>4</mn><mfenced><mrow><msup><mi>cos</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mfenced><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><mn>5</mn></mfrac></mfenced><mo>-</mo><msup><mi>sin</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mfenced><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><mn>5</mn></mfrac></mfenced></mrow></mfenced></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="2 cos open parentheses pi over 5 close parentheses"><mn>2</mn><mi>cos</mi><mfenced><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>5</mn></mfrac></mfenced></math>
<math alttext="2 sin open parentheses pi over 5 close parentheses"><mn>2</mn><mi>sin</mi><mfenced><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>5</mn></mfrac></mfenced></math>

<math alttext="4 cos open parentheses fraction numerator 4 pi over denominator 5 end fraction close parentheses"><mn>4</mn><mi>cos</mi><mfenced><mfrac><mrow><mn>4</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><mn>5</mn></mfrac></mfenced></math>

<math alttext="4 sin open parentheses fraction numerator 4 pi over denominator 5 end fraction close parentheses"><mn>4</mn><mi>sin</mi><mfenced><mfrac><mrow><mn>4</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><mn>5</mn></mfrac></mfenced></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="4 cos open parentheses fraction numerator 4 pi over denominator 5 end fraction close parentheses"><mn>4</mn><mi>cos</mi><mfenced><mfrac><mrow><mn>4</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><mn>5</mn></mfrac></mfenced></math>

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Express functions, equations, or expressions in analytically equivalent forms that are useful in a given mathematical or applied context.
